name: react-date-picker
description: A date picker for your React app.

scripts.build: yarn run build-js && yarn run copy-styles && yarn run build-styles && yarn run copy-types
scripts.prepublishOnly: yarn run clean && yarn run build
scripts.test: yarn run test-eslint && yarn run test-jest
